title: account was hacked...moved to russia and $100 rp purchase was made.
body: needless to say, i was at work and got an email from rito saying that i requested to change my region from NA to Russia... ive checked my bank account and i have not seen the withdraw of the money yet, but i already submitted a ticket for that.  now the next thing is that my account was also moved to a different region... i have since tried logging on via the client and through the support page of my main account (in game name saosini)  of every region  (after changing my password) and can not log on to any of them... so now im at the dilemma that my account has upped and vanished and riot is not being very helpful or prompt in this situation.  makes me regret spending so much money on the game. you would think that account issues like this would get a prompt response, but instead im sitting here waiting for a response that wont come anytime soon. mean while who knows where my account is or what is being done with it. thanks riot for being behind your "valued players" when they need you.

replies.body: I've looked into this for you and see that it has been escalated to our account recovery team.  In the meantime, I highly recommend going over our [account protection ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account)guide for safety practices in case you need to secure anything else not related to league.  It may take a bit to receive a response depending on the current queue,  but rest easy knowing they'll be able to help you!  Hang tight!

with that being said i was contacted 4 days ago to give the standard "prove who you are question", answered all of them within 15 minutes. No reply back as of now. wtf is this crap...?  you would think that keeping your customers happy would be top priority, if i knew customer service was this lousy i would of never sank over 500 bucks in this game for the last 5 years ive been playing... i know that somehow i probably got keylogged so it is my fault, but some sort of rapid response would be nice, especially since this ass clown is purchasing rp with my cards and god knows what he is actually doing to my account... going on +5days to resolve a hacked account is fucking ridiculous.
